title: Hour 1 - Mahomes MVP Path, Prime Video Inaugural Broadcast, Andrew Marchand
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Mahomes MVP Path, Prime Video Inaugural Broadcast, Andrew Marchand
description:
Dan dissects the first broadcast of Thursday Night Football on the Prime Video streaming platform and talks to NFL Insider, Andrew Marchand about how this game will usher in a new era of sorts media. Plus Dan and the Danettes talk about Patrick Mahomes' path to winning NFL MVP this season.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
